resources.string: Get access to all PSTAR sections, unlimited Sample Exams, and future updates!
(If you have previously paid for the full version, you do not need to pay again. Just send us an email with prove of purchase to info@pstarexamapp.com for a free code.)
NOTE: The abbreviations and acronyms listed below may be used throughout the PSTAR exam.
